import { CalendarToday, LocationSearching, MailOutline, PermIdentity, PhoneAndroid, Publish, } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min"; import { getUserById, updateUser } from "../../redux/apiCalls"; import "./user.css"; export default function User(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch() let location = useLocation(); const userID = location.pathname.split("/")[2] const user = useSelector((state) => state.user.editUser) // console.log(user); const [userEdit, setEditUser] = useState(user) const [isWorking, setIsWorking] = useState(false) const handleFields = (e) => { // console.log(e.name); const placeholder = e.name const val = e.value setEditUser({ ...userEdit, [placeholder]: val }) } const handleupdateUser = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("trying to update"); try{ updateUser(userEdit._id, userEdit, dispatch) }catch(err){ console.log(err); } // console.log(user); // console.log(userEdit) } useEffect(() => { getUserById(userID, userID, dispatch) }, [dispatch]) return (

handleFields(e.target)} type="text" placeholder={user.username} className="userUpdateInput" />
handleFields(e.target)} type="text" placeholder={user.firstname} className="userUpdateInput" />
handleFields(e.target)} type="text" placeholder={user.lastname} className="userUpdateInput" />
handleFields(e.target)} type="text" placeholder={user.email} className="userUpdateInput" />
handleFields(e.target)} type="text" placeholder={user.city} className="userUpdateInput" />
handleFields(e.target)} type="text" placeholder={user.state} className="userUpdateInput" />
handleFields(e.target)} type="text" placeholder={user.zipcode} className="userUpdateInput" />
); }
